title: 3-decompositions of genus two handlebody-knots
summary: We investigate the class of $3$-decomposable genus two handlebody-knots and provide a complete classification of essential annuli in their exteriors. We introduce the notion of $τ$- and $ρ$-tangles and good rectangles and annuli. By classifying $τ$- and $ρ$-tangles whose exteriors admit a good rectangle or annulus, we categorize atoroidal $3$-decomposable genus two handlebody-knots into distinct classes, based on the number of essential annuli. As an application, the hyperbolicity of all genus two handlebody-knots with up to six crossings are determined, and numerous hyperbolic handlehody-knots with seven crossings identified. Furthermore, obstructions for a handlebody-knot to be $3$-decomposable are constructed with explicit examples provided.

AI.tldr: 对3-可分解的亏格二体结进行分类，研究其外部空间中的本质环面，并应用于确定交叉数≤6的体结的双曲性
AI.motivation: 研究3-可分解亏格二体结的分类问题，特别是其外部空间中本质环面的结构，这对于理解体结的几何拓扑性质至关重要
AI.method: 引入τ-和ρ-扭结、好矩形和好环面的概念，通过分类具有好矩形或好环面的τ-和ρ-扭结，对非环面3-可分解亏格二体结进行分类
AI.result: 完全分类了3-可分解亏格二体结外部空间中的本质环面，确定了交叉数≤6的所有亏格二体结的双曲性，并识别了许多7交叉的双曲体结
AI.conclusion: 建立了3-可分解亏格二体结的完整分类框架，提供了判断体结是否为3-可分解的障碍条件，并给出了具体例子

title: The strength of a geometric simplex is a key ingredient in a polynomial-time classification of unordered point clouds by Lipschitz continuous invariants
comment: 6 pages, 2 figures. The latest version is maintained at https://kurlin.org/projects/cloud-isometry-spaces/strength-simplex.pdf
summary: The basic input for many real shapes is a finite cloud of unordered points. The strongest equivalence between shapes in practice is Euclidean motion. The recent polynomial-time classification of point clouds required a Lipschitz continuous function that vanishes on degenerate simplices, while the usual volume is not Lipschitz. We define the strength of any geometric simplex and prove its continuity under perturbations with explicit bounds for Lipschitz constants.

AI.tldr: 提出一种新的几何单纯形强度度量，证明其在扰动下的连续性并给出Lipschitz常数显式界，用于点云在欧几里得运动下的多项式时间分类
AI.motivation: 许多实际形状的基本输入是无序点云，而欧几里得运动是实践中最重要的形状等价关系。现有方法需要Lipschitz连续函数来退化单纯形，但通常的体积度量不具备Lipschitz连续性
AI.method: 定义任意几何单纯形的强度度量，证明该度量在扰动下的连续性，并给出Lipschitz常数的显式边界
AI.result: 成功构建了具有Lipschitz连续性的单纯形强度度量，为点云在欧几里得运动下的多项式时间分类提供了理论基础
AI.conclusion: 提出的单纯形强度度量解决了传统体积度量缺乏Lipschitz连续性的问题，为点云分类提供了更稳健的数学工具

title: The realization problem of essential surfaces in knot exteriors
summary:
We study compact orientable essential surfaces in knot exteriors in the 3-sphere. The genus $g$, the number of boundary components $b$, and the boundary slope $p/q$ are fundamental invariants of an essential surface. The \textit{realization problem} asks whether, for a given triple $(g, b, q)$ with $g \ge 0$, $b \ge 1$, and $q \ge 1$, there exists a knot $K \subset S^3$ whose exterior $E(K)$ contains a compact orientable essential surface $F$ of genus $g$ with $b$ boundary components and boundary slope $p/q$ for some $p$.
  In general, not all combinations of $(g, b, q)$ are realizable. First, we show that if $b$ is odd, then $q$ must be equal to $1$. Our main theorem states that for any given even $b \ge 2$ and $q \ge 1$, there exist a genus $g \ge 0$ and a knot $K$ such that $E(K)$ contains a compact orientable essential surface with these parameters.

AI.tldr: 研究了3-球面中纽结外部紧致可定向本质曲面的实现问题，证明了当边界分量数b为奇数时q必须为1，并建立了对于任意偶数b≥2和q≥1，存在满足条件的曲面和纽结。
AI.motivation: 研究纽结外部紧致可定向本质曲面的实现问题，探讨曲面基本不变量（亏格g、边界分量数b、边界斜率p/q）的组合是否都能被某个纽结实现。
AI.method: 通过数学证明方法，首先证明了当b为奇数时q必须等于1的限制条件，然后构造性地证明了对于任意偶数b≥2和q≥1，存在满足条件的亏格g和纽结K。
AI.result: 1. 当边界分量数b为奇数时，边界斜率的分母q必须等于1；2. 对于任意偶数b≥2和任意q≥1，都存在某个亏格g≥0和纽结K，使得其外部包含具有这些参数的紧致可定向本质曲面。
AI.conclusion: 本质曲面的实现问题存在明确的约束条件：b为奇数时q必须为1，但对于任意偶数b和任意q，总能找到合适的纽结实现这些参数组合，揭示了纽结外部曲面参数实现的完整图景。

title: A $y$-ification of Khovanov homology
summary: Motivated by the $y$-ification of HOMFLY--PT homology by Gorsky and Hogancamp, and the $\mathfrak{sl}_2$-action of Gorsky, Hogancamp, and Mellit, we construct $y$-ifications of Khovanov homology and its equivariant versions within Bar-Natan's framework for tangles, and define an action of the element $e$ in $\mathfrak{sl}_2$ on these $y$-ifications. We then prove that our construction is compatible with the previous ones under Rasmussen's spectral sequence from HOMFLY--PT homology to Khovanov homology. Our construction is elementary and well suited to diagrammatic manipulations and algorithmic implementations. As a result, we verify directly that these additional structures distinguish pairs of knots with identical Khovanov homology and HOMFLY--PT homology, in particular the Conway knot and the Kinoshita--Terasaka knot.

AI.tldr: 本文在Bar-Natan框架下构造了Khovanov同调及其等变版本的y-化，并定义了𝔰𝔩₂中元素e的作用，验证了这些额外结构能区分具有相同Khovanov同调和HOMFLY-PT同调的纽结对。
AI.motivation: 受Gorsky和Hogancamp对HOMFLY-PT同调的y-化，以及Gorsky、Hogancamp和Mellit的𝔰𝔩₂-作用的启发，本文旨在将类似结构推广到Khovanov同调领域。
AI.method: 在Bar-Natan的纽结框架内构造Khovanov同调及其等变版本的y-化，定义𝔰𝔩₂中元素e的作用，并通过Rasmussen谱序列证明与先前构造的兼容性。
AI.result: 成功构造了y-化的Khovanov同调，建立了𝔰𝔩₂作用，验证了该构造能区分Conway纽结和Kinoshita-Terasaka纽结等具有相同Khovanov同调和HOMFLY-PT同调的纽结对。
AI.conclusion: 本文提供了构造y-化Khovanov同调的基本方法，适合图式操作和算法实现，这些额外结构增强了Khovanov同调的分辨能力。

title: Dehn quandles of surfaces and their bounded cohomology
summary: We introduce new families of quandles that serve as invariants for classifying closed orientable surfaces. These families generalize the classical Dehn quandle and are defined, respectively, on isotopy classes of unoriented closed curves and on integral weighted multicurves. We establish their fundamental algebraic properties and construct a natural quandle covering that relates them. We then analyze their metric properties, showing that these quandles are unbounded with respect to the quandle metric. Next, we compute their second bounded quandle cohomology, proving it to be infinite-dimensional. We also establish a version of the Gromov Mapping Theorem, showing that the natural map from an abelian quandle extension onto the original quandle induces an injection on bounded quandle cohomology in every dimension. Finally, inspired by recent developments in quandle rings, we analyze idempotents in the integral quandle rings arising from the classical Dehn quandle of a surface.

AI.tldr: 本文引入新的quandle族作为闭可定向曲面的分类不变量，推广经典Dehn quandle，研究其代数性质、度量性质、有界上同调，并分析Dehn quandle环中的幂等元。
AI.motivation: 为闭可定向曲面分类提供新的代数不变量，推广经典Dehn quandle理论，研究quandle的度量结构和有界上同调性质。
AI.method: 定义两类新quandle：基于无向闭曲线同伦类和整数加权多重曲线；研究其代数性质、构造自然quandle覆盖；分析度量性质、计算有界上同调；证明Gromov映射定理版本；分析Dehn quandle环中的幂等元。
AI.result: 新quandle族是有效的曲面不变量；这些quandle在quandle度量下无界；其二阶有界上同调是无限维的；证明了有界上同调的Gromov映射定理；分析了Dehn quandle环中幂等元的性质。
AI.conclusion: 新quandle族为曲面分类提供了有力的代数工具，揭示了quandle度量结构和有界上同调的丰富性质，扩展了quandle理论在低维拓扑中的应用。
